meta_description: This 48in. vanity set features a 1.1811in. thick marble or quartz vanity top with a 4in. backsplash and a 20.25in. sink. Made of solid wood, it includes 6 drawers and 2 doors with soft close hinges and slides. Sink and cabinet hardware included. No assembly required. Transitional design with rear drain placement and 0 faucet holes. 25 year limited manufacturer warranty. From the Patzi collection, this free standing vanity is 34.125in. high and 46in. wide, with a 21in. depth and 336.77lbs. product weight. Vitreous china sink with rectangular shape and 1 basin. Finished back and hidden drawers
meta_title: "Patzi 48" Single Basin Vanity Set with Cabinet and Vanity Top - Faucet Centers Not Included"
details:
Instantly elevate your bathroom's style and functionality with the Patzi. Teeming with organic flair, this wood build features a basket weave inlay pattern. Adding to its inviting warmth, cabinet hardware adorns the vanity's feet and entry points. A spacious two-door cabinet is surrounded by six soft-closing drawers, revealing endless storage options for essentials of all sizes.

Included Components:

  • Covered under Signature Hardware's 25 year limited warranty
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 2 doors, 6 drawers, and 1 shelf
  • Vanity top with a single sink and backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Signature Hardware 954035-48-RUMB-0 Features:

  • Basket weave pattern
  • Full extension drawer slides
  • Includes a matching backsplash and Vitreous China sink
  • Each vanity top is carved from a single piece of stone and will feature natural variations
  • See installation instructions for directions to attach the vanity top and sink
  • All dimensions are +/- 1/2"

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from wood providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation - vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • Double door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 6 full extension drawers with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware
  • Vanity will ship fully assembled

Vanity Top Features:

  • Vanity top includes a sink
  • Each sink features its own rectangular single basin workspace
  • Rear drain location increases available space under the sink
  • Equipped with an overflow drain to help prevent water overflow and spillage from occurring
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 46" (left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 34-1/8" (top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 21" (front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 6
  • Number of Shelves: 1

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 49" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 4"
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Sink Dimensions: 14-3/4"W x 20-1/4"L
  • Sink Cutout Length: 17-3/8" (left to right)
  • Sink Cutout Width: 12" (front to back)
  • Sink Basin Dimensions: 18-1/8" L x 12-3/4" W x 4-1/8" D
